ygData.subject: Re: Our spells
ygData.msgSnippet: I came up with another one too... 5th or 6th circle (16th or 20th level) Tap Affinity cast time: same as gate target: any pc in your group effect: Target is
ygData.messageBody:
I came up with another one too...

5th or 6th circle (16th or 20th level)

Tap Affinity
cast time: same as gate
target: any pc in your group
effect: Target is teleported to his last bind point.


-----Original Message-----
From: Wizard <wizard@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>; _eq_magic@onelist.com <_eq_magic@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, May 15, 1999 5:14 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Our spells


At 16.22 14/05/99 -0700, you wrote:

I had a really cool idea for a spell. I don't know if it could be appropriate for wizards but maybe enchanters and magicians (unless they already have this?)

you cast a spell that creates a double of yourself. Now, when you cast, your double casts in stead of you. for balance reasons it could only last so long, and when it suddenly disappears the monster(s) catch on and attack you. the duration should only be about 30 seconds.

any thoughts... i'm going to send it in as feedback right now so any suggestions would be appreciated


nice spell idea i like it
